Posts.Content: Jan 11, 2010 07:30AM Readyforliving wrote: Thanks to all of you for giving me such great advice, I didnt realise how great this could be, you know you always say yeah I'll join a forum, but never seem to find the time, I am so pleased that I did. I do feel a lot more positive about my operation and like you have all said I have my ups and downs, but I look at my children who give me a little smile and I know what I have to do!!  I do have one question though alot of you mention Zometa, I have never heard of it what is it for???
Posts.Title: How do you keep positive? Readyforliving Diana63
